#include <iostream>
#include <vector>

class Exception
{
public:
	Exception(int i = 0) : _i(i) {
	}
	~Exception() throw(int)
	{
		std::cout << "Throw : " << _i << std::endl;
		throw _i;
	}
private:
	int _i;
};

class OtherObject
{
public:
	~OtherObject() {
		std::cout << "~OtherObject" << std::endl;
	}
};

int main()
{
	try {
		OtherObject o;
		{
			Exception e(10);
			throw 3; 
		}
		std::cout << "after throw" << std::endl;
	} catch (int i) {
		std::cout << "Catch : " << i << std::endl;
	}

	try {
		std::vector<Exception> v(4);
	} catch (...) {
		std::cout << "Catch something" << std::endl;
	}
}
